thread.title: Ex-boss of China's Anbang pleads for leniency at trial

title: Ex-boss of China's Anbang pleads for leniency at trial
text:
Ex-boss of China's Anbang pleads for leniency at trial 9:02am EDT - 01:26 
The former chairman of China's Anbang Insurance Group has requested leniency at the end of his high-profile trial in Shanghai for alleged economic crimes, including fraud and embezzlement involving more than $10 billion. Kate King reports.   
The former chairman of China's Anbang Insurance Group has requested leniency at the end of his high-profile trial in Shanghai for alleged economic crimes, including fraud and embezzlement involving more than $10 billion. Kate King reports.  //reut.rs/2J6lqar
